text: Marthinus "Tinus" Linee (23 August 1969 â€“ 3 November 2014) was a South African rugby player. Linee played as a centre. He played all of his rugby for Western Province. Linee was born in Paarl, Western Cape. He represented Western Province and the Stormers in Super Rugby. He played nine tour games for the Springboks between 1993 and 1994, but never played in a test for South Africa. Tinus died in Paarl, Western Cape from complications following motor neurone disease, aged 45. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease Category:South African rugby union players
title: Tinus Linee
